# EpiViz: Circos plots for epidemiologists

EpiViz is an R package designed to streamline and enable the efficient
creation of Circos plots for epidemiological data.

Circular layouts provide a unique way to visualize large amounts of
information, allowing researchers to observe patterns across multiple
categories and datasets simultaneously.

![Annotated Circos Plot showing tracks and
sectors](reference/figures/annotated_circos_plot2.png)

Annotated Circos Plot showing tracks and sectors

# Package index

## Main Plotting Function

- [`circos_plot()`](https://mattlee821.github.io/EpiViz/reference/circos_plot.md)
  : Create a Circos plot with up to 3 tracks using points, lines or bars

## Built-in Data

- [`EpiViz_data1`](https://mattlee821.github.io/EpiViz/reference/EpiViz_data1.md)
  : Example data: Simulated epidemiology results for track 1
- [`EpiViz_data2`](https://mattlee821.github.io/EpiViz/reference/EpiViz_data2.md)
  : Example data: Simulated epidemiology results for track 2
- [`EpiViz_data3`](https://mattlee821.github.io/EpiViz/reference/EpiViz_data3.md)
  : Example data: Simulated epidemiology results for track 3
